materials.raw_text:
Aluminum (Al): 40 g 
 Arsenic (As): 80 g 
 Beryllium (Be): 10 g 
 Cesium (Cs): 10 g

sourcing.instructions:
Aluminum: Available at hardware stores or metal suppliers. 
 Arsenic: Obtain from chemical supply companies (ensure proper handling and safety). 
 Beryllium: Purchase from specialized metal suppliers (requires handling precautions). 
 Cesium: Buy from chemical suppliers (ensure they provide safety data sheets).
